name: ecotonal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to an area where one type of natural environment meets another: the ecotonal area between the mangrove-coastal marsh and the inland marsh See
ecotone
More examplesFewer examplesWetlands have been generally considered ecotonal communities.This species is not confined to the shallow parts of the ecotonal zone.Ecotonal areas are the transition zones between ecological systems where native plant diversity is often greatest.
